com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview

Class ShowcaseView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview.ShowcaseView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, ShowcaseViewApi

    public class ShowcaseView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener, ShowcaseViewApi
    A view which allows you to showcase areas of your app with an explanation.
